body_html: You can use the Python decorator @tf.RegisterGradient to add a gradient to a Python op while only touching Python code. https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/v0.6.0/api_docs/python/framework.html#RegisterGradient
body_text: You can use the Python decorator @tf.RegisterGradient to add a gradient to a Python op while only touching Python code. https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/v0.6.0/api_docs/python/framework.html#RegisterGradient
body: You can use the Python decorator `@tf.RegisterGradient` to add a gradient to a Python op while only touching Python code. https://www.tensorflow.org/versions/v0.6.0/api_docs/python/framework.html#RegisterGradient
